description: Numbers n such that floor(exp(n)) is prime.
mathematica: Do[ If[ PrimeQ[ Floor[ \[ExponentialE]^n] ], Print[n] ], {n, 0, 4750} ]Select[Range[15000],PrimeQ[Floor[Exp[#]]]&] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Oct 16 2012 *)
author: _Patrick De Geest_, Oct 15 1999
extensions: More terms from _Robert G. Wilson v_, May 09 2001
